properties.name: Map of the county of Saratoga / by David H. Burr ; engd. by Rawdon, Clark & Co., Albany, & Rawdon, Wright & Co., N. York.
properties.description: from An atlas of the state of New York, designed for the use of engineers, containing a map of the state and of the several counties. / Projected and drawn ... under the superintendence and direction of Simeon de Witt.
